channel.title: Weapons
channel.description: Heeeellooo when i am pking i click on attack first hit goes well then with the second hit (normal) weapons don't move anymore and i need to click attack again to make it move here i have a picture of it Magic shortbow is working good with the 2nd hit and more :D [img]http://img88.imageshack.us/img88/875/ffca6.png[/img]
